name: Reverse Horse Puzzle
description:
Pitch 

Help the flag-carrying horse while he travel through time to find his way back to the start of the race. But be careful, many slimes have decided to stop our unfortunate hero !

Cute puzzle game made in 55h.

Game rules Use the directional arrows to guide the horse in this reverse race, from finish to start, with a limited amount of moves. You can quit the game with Escape.

By Camille Lecappon (2D/Prog), Lucas Nayrac (Design/Prog)
